description
Feel like Ryu from Street Fighter IV with this alternate gi bottom. Combine it with the matching top and become the ultimate martial artist! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour Ryu de Street Fighter IV avec ce bas de kimono alternatif. Combinez-le avec le haut et devenez le combattant ultime ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Fühle dich mit diesem alternativen unteren Teil eines Gis wie Ryu aus Street Fighter IV! Kombiniere es mit dem passenden Oberteil und werde zum ultimativen Martial-Arts-Kämpfer! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Diventa Ryu di Street Fighter IV con la parte sotto del kimono (sopra). Combinalo con il sopra per essere il lottatore di arti marziali definitivo! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte este quimono alternativo y siéntete como Ryu de Street Fighter IV! ¡Combínalo con la parte superior y siente el poder del shotokan! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 リュウになりきることができる道着 （下）のアレンジ ver.！上下あわせてあなたも格闘家気分！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 류가 되는 도복(하의). 어렌지 ver.！ 상, 하의를 맞추면 당신도 격투가! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like Ryu from Street Fighter IV with this alternate gi bottom. Combine it with the matching top and become the ultimate martial artist! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 可以化身為Ryu的柔道袍 (下)之特別版！上下合起來讓你擁有格鬥家的感覺！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
